Serpentine Blast.name: Serpentine Blast
Serpentine Blast.flavor: A bolt of lightning leaps from your fingers to strike at your foe, twisting past obstacles.
Serpentine Blast.attack: Charisma vs. Reflex. The attack ignores cover and concealment, but not superior cover or total concealment.

Chromatic Orb.name: Chromatic Orb
Chromatic Orb.flavor: An orb of arcane energy shifts colors as it hurtles toward your enemy. On impact, it erupts with damaging force, releasing the energy that was dominant at the time of impact.
Chromatic Orb.onHit:
3d10 + Charisma modifier damage. Roll a d6 to determine the attack’s damage type and effect.
    1. Yellow: Radiant damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).
    2. Red: Fire damage, and each creature adjacent to the target takes fire damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.
    3. Green: Poison damage, and ongoing 5 poison damage (save ends).
    4. Turquoise: Lightning damage, and you slide the target a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier.
    5. Blue: Cold damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).
    6. Violet: Psychic damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to AC (save ends).
Chromatic Orb.onMiss: 1d10 damage. Roll a d6 to determine the attack’s damage type and effect, as above.

Bounding Bolt.name: Bounding Bolt
Bounding Bolt.flavor: Your sparkling flourish produces a bolt of lightning that strikes your foe and then flies to nearby creatures.
Bounding Bolt.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier lightning damage, and ongoing 5 lightning damage (save ends).
Bounding Bolt.secondaryTarget: One creature within 5 squares of you
Bounding Bolt.effect: The tertiary target takes ongoing 5 lightning damage (save ends).
Bounding Bolt.tertiaryTarget: One creature within 5 squares of the secondary target.

Thunderstroke.name: Thunderstroke
Thunderstroke.flavor: A stroke of lightning strikes your foe from overhead, followed by a concussive boom.
Thunderstroke.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier thunder damage. If the target is in the burst’s origin square, it takes 3d8 extra lightning damage.
Thunderstroke.stormMagic: A target hit by this power is also knocked prone.

Lightning Strike.name: Lightning Strike
Lightning Strike.flavor: Lightning strikes your foe and then ricochets to another enemy.
Lightning Strike.onHit:
1d8 + Charisma modifier lightning damage. An enemy of your choice other than the target and within 10 squares of the target takes lightning damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.
Level 21: 2d8 + Charisma modifier lightning damage.
Lightning Strike.stormMagic: You can apply your Storm Power bonus either to the damage roll against the target or to the damage taken by the enemy within 10 squares of the target.

Whirlwind.name: Whirlwind
Whirlwind.flavor: You create a small whirlwind that buffets creatures and knocks them off their feet.
Whirlwind.stormMagic: You can choose not to target a creature in the origin square of the burst.
Whirlwind.onHit: 1d10 + Charisma modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.

Acid Claw.name: Acid Claw
Acid Claw.flavor: You contort your hand as if mimicking a monstrous claw. A black talon of acid then bursts from thin air and swipes at your foe.
Acid Claw.onHit: 2d10 + Charisma modifier acid damage, and the target takes acid damage equal to your Strength modifier at the start of its next turn.
Acid Claw.dragonMagic: Each creature adjacent to the target takes acid damage equal to your Strength modifier.

Thundering Gust.name: Thundering Gust
Thundering Gust.flavor: You call forth the force of the raging storm and shrieking gales. Wind howls about your foes, buffeting them and sliding them.
Thundering Gust.onHit: 1d10 + Charisma modifier thunder damage, and you slide the target a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier.
Thundering Gust.stormMagic: If you choose not to slide any targets, until the end of your next turn, you gain a fly speed equal to 1 + your Dexterity modifier, and you can hover.

Swirling Stars.name: Swirling Stars
Swirling Stars.flavor: A cyclonic cloud of starry motes descends on the batlefield, following your gesticulations to land in your enemies’ midst.
Swirling Stars.cosmicMagic: You can choose not to target a creature in the origin square of the burst.
Swirling Stars.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier cold and thunder damage.

Spark Form.name: Spark Form
Spark Form.flavor: Your body briefly becomes a shower of dancing sparks that zips among foes, shocking them as you go.
Spark Form.effect: You shift your speed + 2. During the shift, you can move through enemies' spaces. When you leave any creature's space, make the following attack against that creature. Whenever you use this power, you can make the attack against a creature only once.

Acid Shackles.name: Acid Shackles
Acid Shackles.flavor: Caustic words crackle from your mouth, taking physical form around your foes as bands of acid that further punish those who move.
Acid Shackles.onHit: 3d8 + Charisma modifier acid damage. If the target moves before the end of its next turn, it takes 10 acid damage.
Acid Shackles.wildMagic: If you hit and you rolled an even number on the attack roll, add your Dexterity modifier to the acid damage dealt if the target moves before the end of its next turn. If you hit and you rolled an odd number on the attack roll, one enemy within 2 squares of the target takes acid damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

Storm Arc.name: Storm Arc
Storm Arc.flavor: A flare of sparks shoots out from your hand and hits the ground in your enemies’ midst, exploding with a roar.
Storm Arc.stormMagic: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a fly speed equal to your speed, and you can hover.

Overpowering Lightning.name: Overpowering Lightning
Overpowering Lightning.flavor: A blast of lightning overwhelms your foe, sizzling across its flesh and rending its senses bereft of function.
Overpowering Lightning.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier lightning damage, and the target is stunned until the end of your next turn.

Thunderous Might.name: Thunderous Might
Thunderous Might.flavor: A forceful thundercloud smashes into your foes, bruising their flesh and sending them sliding.
Thunderous Might.onHit: 4d8 + Charisma modifier thunder damage, and you slide the target a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier.
Thunderous Might.stormMagic: The target grants combat advantage to the next ally of yours who attacks it before the end of your next turn.

Blinding Bolt.name: Blinding Bolt
Blinding Bolt.flavor: You shoot a ray of white light at your foe. The beam sears flesh and eyes, and it takes time for your enemy’s vision to fully return.
Blinding Bolt.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier radiant damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target is blinded. When the blinded condition ends, the target then treats each creature more than 5 squares away from it as having concealment (save ends).
Blinding Bolt.onMiss: Half damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target treats each creature  more than 5 squares away fromit as having concealment.

Howling Tempest.name: Howling Tempest
Howling Tempest.flavor: You summon a howling storm on the battlefield. The tempest’s thunder deafens your foes, and its winds scatter them.
Howling Tempest.stormMagic: You can choose not to target a creature in the origin square of the burst.
Howling Tempest.onHit: 2d6 + Charisma modifier thunder damage, and the target is deafened (save ends). You slide the target a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier.
Howling Tempest.effect: The burst creates a zone of deafening wind that lasts until the end of your next turn. Each creature that starts its turn within the zone takes thunder damage equal to your Charisma modifier. As a move action, you can move the zone 3 squares.

Ice Javelins.name: Ice Javelins
Ice Javelins.flavor: A trio of icy javelins forms around you. One at a time, you send each spear shooting toward a different enemy.
Ice Javelins.onHit: 1d10 + Charisma modifier cold damage, and ongoing 5 cold damage (save ends).

Winds of Change.name: Winds of Change
Winds of Change.flavor: You become like the wind, blasting your enemies with the force of a storm.
Winds of Change.onHit: 3d8 + Charisma modifier damage, and you push the target 3 squares.
Winds of Change.onMiss: Half damage, and you push the target 1 square.
Winds of Change.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a fly speed equal to your speed, and you can hover.

Ice Stalagmites.name: Ice Stalagmites
Ice Stalagmites.flavor: Stalagmites of ice burst up from the ground, stabbing at your enemies and turning the air around them frigid.
Ice Stalagmites.onHit: 1d12 + Charisma modifier cold damage, and you must slide the target 1 square.
Ice Stalagmites.effect: You conjure an ice stalagmite in 1 square the target vacated. Each ice stalagmite lasts until the end of the encounter, until destroyed, or until you dismiss it as a free action. Each ice stalagmite has AC 5, Reflex 5, Fortitude 21, resist cold 10, and 40 hit points. Each creature that starts its turn adjacent to an ice stalagmite takes cold damage equal to your Charisma modifier.

Lightning Daggers.name: Lightning Daggers
Lightning Daggers.flavor: Slivers of lightning leap from you, forming a bond with your foe. Periodically, you can send another charge to shock your enemy.
Lightning Daggers.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you can repeat the attack as a free action once per round during your turn.

Prismatic Lightning.name: Prismatic Lightning
Prismatic Lightning.flavor: Your words summon a storm of multicolored bolts. Some sear, others burn, and a few strike your foes blind.
keywords: Acid, Arcane, Cold, Implement, Lightning, Psychic
Prismatic Lightning.target: Each creature in the burst (choose one defense for each target)
Prismatic Lightning.onHit: 3d6 + Charisma modifier lightning and psychic damage, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.

Crashing Winds.name: Crashing Winds
Crashing Winds.flavor: Everything standing near you is battered and knocked away, and the winds continue to swirl in your vicinity.
Crashing Winds.effect: You push the target a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier.
Crashing Winds.stormMagic: Until the end of the encounter, at the start of your turn, you push each enemy adjacent to you a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier.

Leaping Lightning.name: Leaping Lightning
Leaping Lightning.flavor: Storm bolts leap toward your enemy. A foe too close to your first victim suffers a discharging lightning blast for its trouble.
Leaping Lightning.onHit: 3d6 + Charisma modifier lightning damage, and ongoing 10 lightning damage (save ends). Whenever the target takes the ongoing lightning damage, make a secondary attack as a free action.
Leaping Lightning.secondaryTarget: One creature within 10 squares of the primary target and in the primary target’s line of sight

Acid Typhoon.name: Acid Typhoon
Acid Typhoon.flavor: A curling wave of acid rolls into the world from the Elemental Chaos, dissolving the flesh of creatures that stand in your way.
Acid Typhoon.stormMagic: You can choose not to target a creature in the origin square of the burst.
Acid Typhoon.onHit: 4d8 + Charisma modifier acid and thunder damage, and ongoing 10 acid damage (save ends).
Acid Typhoon.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 5 acid damage (save ends).

Sorcerous Sirocco.name: Sorcerous Sirocco
Sorcerous Sirocco.flavor: You exhale a magic-enhanced breath that briefly sends you and an ally flying through the air.
Sorcerous Sirocco.target: You and one ally in the burst
Sorcerous Sirocco.effect: Each target moves a number of squares equal to his or her speed + 2. Each target can fly during this movement but falls if he or she does not land by the end of the movement.

Absorb Storm.name: Absorb Storm
Absorb Storm.flavor: You channel the power of the storm to bolster yourself against an attack and divert the power to your next assault.
Absorb Storm.trigger: You take cold, lightning, or thunder damage
Absorb Storm.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain resistance to the triggering damage type equal to your Charisma modifier. Your next attack before the end of the encounter that deals the triggering damage type gains a +2 bonus to the attack roll.

Extinguishing Rain.name: Extinguishing Rain
Extinguishing Rain.flavor: Clouds emerge from your body, saturating the air. Fires no longer threaten you, and nearby flames are dampened.
Extinguishing Rain.target: One conjuration or zone that has the fire keyword
Extinguishing Rain.effect: Until the end of the encounter, each target gains resistance to fire equal to your Charisma modifier. Make an attack.
Extinguishing Rain.attack: Charisma + 2 vs. the Will of the target’s creator
Extinguishing Rain.onHit: The target is destroyed. All its effects end, including those that a save can end.

Fog Form.name: Fog Form
Fog Form.flavor: In an instant, your body melts into a cloud of fog.
Fog Form.trigger: You are hit by an attack
Fog Form.effect: You become insubstantial until the end of your next turn.

Dominant Winds.name: Dominant Winds
Dominant Winds.flavor: Silver winds curl out of nowhere and lift you or an ally briefly into the air.
Dominant Winds.target: You or one ally in the burst
Dominant Winds.effect: The target can fly a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier as a free action.

Storm Body.name: Storm Body
Storm Body.flavor: The spirit of the storm engulfs you, and you become as the wind and lightning, heedless of the earth and dangerous to the touch.
Storm Body.effect: You become insubstantial until the start of your next turn and can fly 10 squares with this move action. Each creature that makes a melee attack against you during this move takes lightning damage equal to your Charisma modifier.

Ultimate Resistance.name: Ultimate Resistance
Ultimate Resistance.flavor: You become sheathed in scales of black, white, blue, or some other hue, and you gain mighty resistance.
Ultimate Resistance.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain resist 30 against a damage type of your choice: acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, necrotic, poison, psychic, radiant, or thunder. Once per round as a minor action, you can change the resistance to another of these types.

Mists of Disarray.name: Mists of Disarray
Mists of Disarray.flavor: Violet mist bursts out from a spot on the battlefield. As your foes breathe in the fumes, they begin to reel in confusion.
Mists of Disarray.onHit: 1d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and you push the target 1 square.
Mists of Disarray.wildMagic: If you rolled an even number on the attack roll, you slide the target a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier instead of pushing it.

Essence Prism.name: Essence Prism
Essence Prism.flavor: Your implement flashes with the colors of the rainbow, and as the light touches your foe, chaos distorts the creature’s nature.
Essence Prism.wildMagic: If you rolled an even number on the attack roll, the target loses all resistances until the end of your next turn.

Chaos Ray.name: Chaos Ray
Chaos Ray.flavor: With a wild gesture, you release a bolt of dazzling, multicolored chaos that folds space and makes your opponent’s mind reel.
Chaos Ray.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target swaps positions with a creature within 3 squares of it.

Azure Talons.name: Azure Talons
Azure Talons.flavor: Blue claws of lightning materialize around you and slash at foes that remain too close.
Azure Talons.onHit: 3d8 + Charisma modifier lightning damage. If the target ends its next turn within 2 squares of you, it takes 5 lightning damage.
Azure Talons.dragonMagic: If the target ends its next turn within 2 squares of you, it takes lightning damage equal to 5 + your Strength modifier.

Chaos Infusion.name: Chaos Infusion
Chaos Infusion.flavor: You puncture the walls between the Elemental Chaos and your own plane, unleashing an elemental force that overwhelms foes.
keywords: Arcane, Fire, Force, Implement, Lightning, Psychic
Chaos Infusion.onHit: 4d6 + Charisma modifier fire, force, lightning, and psychic damage.
Chaos Infusion.wildMagic: Until the end of your next turn, when you use a power that grants an additional benefit on an odd or an even die roll, gain the benefit of both the even and the odd die results. If you can’t gain both benefits, choose one.

Tearing Claws.name: Tearing Claws
Tearing Claws.flavor: Spectral claws strike out from your body, slashing at your foes and shoving them backward.
Tearing Claws.onHit: 1d10 + Charisma modifier damage, and you push the target 1 square.
Tearing Claws.dragonMagic: If the target is bloodied, you push it 3 squares instead of 1.

Thundering Roar.name: Thundering Roar
Thundering Roar.flavor: You emit the thundering roar of a hunting lion, deafening creatures near you.
Thundering Roar.onHit: 2d6 + Charisma modifier thunder damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Searing Sands.name: Searing Sands
Searing Sands.flavor: You send a blast of searing sand at your foes. The assault flays their skin and throws up a temporary curtain for you to hide behind.
Searing Sands.onHit: 2d6 + Charisma modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, you have concealment.

Thunder Wyrm's Jaws.name: Thunder Wyrm's Jaws
Thunder Wyrm's Jaws.flavor: You emit a draconic roar. An echo of the call bursts over your foe’s head, buffeting your enemy as the sound bolsters you.
Thunder Wyrm's Jaws.onHit: 3d8 + Charisma modifier thunder damage. You gain temporary hit points equal to 1d6 + your Strength modifier.

Downbeat of Wings.name: Downbeat of Wings
Downbeat of Wings.flavor: You give life to a memory of dragons in the form of phantom wings. With a beat of these wings, you send your foe sprawling.
Downbeat of Wings.onHit: 3d6 + Charisma modifier damage, and you push the target 2 squares and knock it prone.
Downbeat of Wings.dragonMagic: You shift a number of squares equal to your Strength modifier.

Wyrmblight.name: Wyrmblight
Wyrmblight.flavor: With a draconic roar, you loose a blast of fire laced with black venom.
Wyrmblight.onHit: 4d6 + Charisma modifier fire and poison damage.

Glacial Armor.name: Glacial Armor
Glacial Armor.flavor: The air around you turns deathly cold, and frost coalesces on your body, creating a protective shell of ice.
Glacial Armor.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +2 power bonus to AC and Fortitude, and each creature that hits you with a melee attack takes cold damage equal to your Charisma modifier.

Fury of Dragotha.name: Fury of Dragotha
Fury of Dragotha.flavor: A vision of Dragotha, an undead dragon, fills your sight. You borrow a fragment of its breath weapon to unleash a rotting blast.
Fury of Dragotha.dragonMagic: Until the end of the encounter, each creature that starts its turn adjacent to you takes necrotic damage equal to your Strength modifier.

Doom of Chaos.name: Doom of Chaos
Doom of Chaos.flavor: You yell a word of ancient origin. Upon hearing it, your foe succumbs to the primeval energy of chaos.
Doom of Chaos.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and ongoing 5 psychic damage (save ends).
Doom of Chaos.effect: Until the end of the encounter, at the start of each of the target’s turns but before it takes any ongoing damage, choose acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder. The target gains vulnerable 10 to that damage type until the start of its next turn. If the target is still taking ongoing psychic damage from this power, it gains vulnerable 15 psychic instead.
Doom of Chaos.wildMagic: If you rolled an even number on the attack roll, you can apply the effect to a creature within 10 squares of the target instead of to the target. If you rolled an odd number on the attack roll, you can apply the effect to each creature adjacent to the target instead of to the target.

Spatial Trip.name: Spatial Trip
Spatial Trip.flavor: You spin around, releasing a blaze of golden energy. As you finish your revolution, you disappear and reappear a short distance away.
Spatial Trip.effect: You teleport a number of squares equal to half your speed.

Chaotic Defense.name: Chaotic Defense
Chaotic Defense.flavor: You create a din of chaotic sounds, from a wolf ’s forlorn howl to a dead sailor’s dirge. In the cacophony, you find temporary aid.
Chaotic Defense.effect:
Roll a d4 to determine the power’s effect.
1: You gain temporary hit points equal to 2d6 + your Charisma modifier.
2: You gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses until the end of the encounter.
3: Until the end of the encounter, each creature that attacks you takes 2d6 damage.
4: You gain all three of the benefits described above.

Sorcerous Pulse.name: Sorcerous Pulse
Sorcerous Pulse.flavor: You drown out the clash of combat and focus on one type of energy, which you channel into your spells for extra power.
Sorcerous Pulse.effect: Choose acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, necrotic, poison, psychic, radiant, or thunder. Until the end of the encounter, whenever you use an arcane power that has the chosen keyword, you can roll the damage twice and use the higher result.

Avatars of Chaos.name: Avatars of Chaos
Avatars of Chaos.flavor: You briefly embody four principles of chaos, dividing yourself into a quartet of poles, each of which is charged with a potent threat.
keywords: Arcane, Conjuration, Fire, Force, Lightning, Psychic
Avatars of Chaos.effect:
You conjure images of yourself in 4 unoccupied, nonadjacent squares within 10 squares of you, and then you disappear from the world. Each round at the start of your turn, choose one of the four images. Your essence occupies that image, allowing you to act normally (including moving and making attacks).
When you conjure each image, choose a keyword for it from among fire, force, lightning, and psychic. You can’t choose the same keyword twice. While you occupy an image, you gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls when you use a power that has a keyword that matches that image.
Each image lasts until the end of the encounter, until it is destroyed, or until you dismiss it. Each image occupies 1 square, and creatures cannot move through an image’s space. An image can be targeted by attacks and uses your defenses. Each image (including the one you occupy) has 1 hit point, and a missed attack never damages an image. An image is destroyed if it is reduced to 0 hit points or fewer. If you occupy an image when it is destroyed, you can immediately move to any other image still present. If you occupy the last remaining image when it is destroyed, you reappear in that square.
As a minor action, you can dismiss all remaining images and reappear in any square that was occupied by an image when you took this action.

Deep Shroud.name: Deep Shroud
Deep Shroud.flavor: You raise and then lower your hands, creating an obscuring shadow that cloaks you and the area around you.
Deep Shroud.effect: You create a shroud of supernatural shadow around you. Until the end of your next turn, the space you occupy and each square adjacent to you are heavily obscured.

Flight of Dragons.name: Flight of Dragons
Flight of Dragons.flavor: A flight of phantom dragons swoops down and gathers up you and your allies, bearing all of you aloft.
Flight of Dragons.target: You and each ally in the burst
Flight of Dragons.effect: Each target gains a fly speed equal to his or her speed until the end of your next turn.
Flight of Dragons.sustainMinor: The effect persists. When you fail to sustain this power, each target floats to the ground without taking falling damage.
Flight of Dragons.dragonMagic: Each target gains resist 10 to your choice of acid, cold, fire, poison, lightning, or thunder while you sustain the effect.

Burning Spray.name: Burning Spray
Burning Spray.flavor: You fling your arm in a wide arc, casting liquid fire at your foes.
Burning Spray.onHit:
1d8 + Charisma modifier fire damage.
Level 21: 2d8 + Charisma modifier fire damage.
Burning Spray.dragonMagic: The next enemy that hits you with a melee attack before the end of your next turn takes fire damage equal to your Strength modifier.

Dragonfrost.name: Dragonfrost
Dragonfrost.flavor: A gust of frost hammers your foe and knocks it back.
Dragonfrost.onHit:
1d8 + Charisma modifier cold damage, and you push the target 1 square.
Level 21: 2d8 + Charisma modifier cold damage.
Dragonfrost.special: This power can be used as a ranged basic attack.

Tempest Breath.name: Tempest Breath
Tempest Breath.flavor: You exhale mist that burns and disorients your foes, and a lingering fog obscures you.
Tempest Breath.onHit: 2d6 + Charisma modifier acid damage, and the target can’t gain combat advantage against any creature until the end of your next turn.
Tempest Breath.dragonMagic: You gain concealment until the end of your next turn.

Explosive Pyre.name: Explosive Pyre
Explosive Pyre.flavor: Your foe stands at the center of a conflagration of your design.
Explosive Pyre.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier fire damage. Until the start of your next turn, any enemy that enters a square adjacent to the target or starts its turn there takes 1d6 fire damage. An enemy can take this damage only once per turn.

Dragonflame Mantle.name: Dragonflame Mantle
Dragonflame Mantle.flavor: You ward yourself with a mantle of flame.
Dragonflame Mantle.trigger: You are hit by an attack
Dragonflame Mantle.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a +1 power bonus to all defenses, and any creature that hits you with a melee attack takes 1d6 fire damage.

Flame Spiral.name: Flame Spiral
Flame Spiral.flavor: You surround yourself in a vortex of fire, which lashes out at nearby foes.
Flame Spiral.target: One, two, or three creatures in the burst
Flame Spiral.effect: Until the start of your next turn, any enemy that enters a square adjacent to you or starts its turn there takes 1d6 fire damage. An enemy can take this damage only once per turn.

Ice Dragon's Teeth.name: Ice Dragon's Teeth
Ice Dragon's Teeth.flavor: Shards of ice like the teeth of a dragon explode among your foes, chilling and slowing them.
Ice Dragon's Teeth.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier cold damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

Palest Flames.name: Palest Flames
Palest Flames.flavor: The blue flames that engulf your foe make it more susceptible to the ravages of cold.
Palest Flames.onHit: 1d10 + Charisma modifier fire damage, and the target gains vulnerable 10 cold (save ends).
Palest Flames.onMiss: Half damage, and the target gains vulnerable 5 cold until the end of your next turn.

Elemental Shift.name: Elemental Shift
Elemental Shift.flavor: The alignment of elements within you changes at your command.
Elemental Shift.effect:
You can change the resistance granted by your Dragon Soul or Wild Soul to one of the other damage types for the rest of the encounter. In addition, one ally adjacent to you gains resist 5 to the damage type that you resist until the end of the encounter.
Level 11: Resist 10.
Level 21: Resist 15.

Rimestorm.name: Rimestorm
Rimestorm.flavor: A wintry blast drives your enemies to their knees.
Rimestorm.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier cold damage, and you knock the target prone.
Rimestorm.dragonMagic: The target also takes a -2 penalty to Fortitude until the end of your next turn.

Shout.name: Shout
Shout.flavor: A deafening shout leaves your enemies reeling.
Shout.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier thunder damage, and the target is deafened until the end of your next turn.

Crushing Sphere.name: Crushing Sphere
Crushing Sphere.flavor: A field of force contracts around your enemies, crushing them.
Crushing Sphere.onHit: 2d6 + Charisma modifier force damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Adamantine Echo.name: Adamantine Echo
Adamantine Echo.flavor: You unleash a thunderous roar to batter your enemies, and scales like those of an adamantine dragon cover your skin.
Adamantine Echo.onHit: 2d6 + Charisma modifier thunder damage, and ongoing 5 thunder damage (save ends).
Adamantine Echo.effect: You gain a +2 power bonus to AC until the end of the encounter.
Adamantine Echo.dragonMagic: The power bonus to AC equals your Strength modifier.

Prime the Fire.name: Prime the Fire
Prime the Fire.flavor: Flames wash over your foe and then subside, but they flare to life again if the enemy acts in hostility.
Prime the Fire.effect: If the target attacks before the start of your next turn, the target takes 2d8 fire damage.

Invert Resistance.name: Invert Resistance
Invert Resistance.flavor: You twist the nature of your foes to turn their protection into a weakness.
Invert Resistance.effect: Each target loses its resistances and gains vulnerable 5 to the damage types it had resistance against (save ends both).

Devour Magic.name: Devour Magic
Devour Magic.flavor: You consume lingering magic to empower your own.
Devour Magic.attack: Charisma + 2 vs. the Will of the target’s creator
Devour Magic.onHit: The target is destroyed. All its effects end, including those that a save can end.
Devour Magic.dragonMagic: You gain the bonus from your Scales of the Dragon, whether or not you’re bloodied.
Devour Magic.wildMagic: Until the end of the encounter, the first time you attack during each of your turns, you can choose your Chaos Burst benefit, instead of having your attack roll determine it.

Dragon Tail Meditation.name: Dragon Tail Meditation
Dragon Tail Meditation.flavor: A lashing tail of lightning protects you from a foe that thinks it has the advantage.
Dragon Tail Meditation.trigger: An enemy moves into a space where it flanks you
Dragon Tail Meditation.dragonMagic: You push the target a number of squares equal to your Strength modifier.

Breath of the Desert Dragon.name: Breath of the Desert Dragon
Breath of the Desert Dragon.flavor: A gust of warm air lifts creatures skyward.
Breath of the Desert Dragon.effect: Each target can fly a number of squares equal to 6 + your Strength modifier as an immediate reaction. Until the end of your next turn, each target can fly the same distance as a move action.

Thunder Slam.name: Thunder Slam
Thunder Slam.flavor: A shock wave of sound slams into the enemy.
Thunder Slam.onHit: 2d10 + Charisma modifier thunder damage, and you push the target 3 squares.

Acid Orb.name: Acid Orb
Acid Orb.flavor: You hurl a globe of acid at a distant enemy.
Acid Orb.onHit:
1d10 + Charisma modifier acid damage.
Level 21: 2d10 + Charisma modifier acid damage.
Acid Orb.special: This power can be used as a ranged basic attack.

Chaos Bolt.name: Chaos Bolt
Chaos Bolt.flavor: A bolt of many-colored light leaps from your hand and screams toward an enemy’s head.
Chaos Bolt.onHit:
1d10 + Charisma modifier psychic damage.
Level 21: 2d10 + Charisma modifier psychic damage.
Chaos Bolt.wildMagic: If you rolled an even number for the primary attack roll, make a secondary attack.
Chaos Bolt.secondaryTarget: One creature within 5 squares of the target last hit by this power
Chaos Bolt.secondaryOnHit: 1d6 psychic damage. If you rolled an even number for the secondary attack roll, repeat the secondary attack. You can attack a creature only once with a single use of this power.

Storm Walk.name: Storm Walk
Storm Walk.flavor: The thunder of your steps batters your foe.
Storm Walk.onHit:
1d8 + Charisma modifier thunder damage.
Level 21: 2d8 + Charisma modifier thunder damage.
Storm Walk.effect: Before or after the attack, you shift 1 square.

Bedeviling Burst.name: Bedeviling Burst
Bedeviling Burst.flavor: An eruption of psychic energy assaults your enemies’ minds, sending them staggering.
Bedeviling Burst.target: One or two creatures in the burst
Bedeviling Burst.onHit: 1d10 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier.
Bedeviling Burst.wildMagic: If you rolled an even number on the attack roll, you slide the target instead of pushing it.

Frostbind.name: Frostbind
Frostbind.flavor: Creaking ice envelops and hinders your enemy.
Frostbind.onHit: 3d6 + Charisma modifier cold damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to Reflex until the end of your next turn.

Dazzling Ray.name: Dazzling Ray
Dazzling Ray.flavor: A brilliant beam lances out to strike your foe and befuddle it.
Dazzling Ray.wildMagic: If you rolled an even number on the attack roll, the target takes a penalty to attack rolls against you equal to your Dexterity modifier (save ends).

Dragonfang Bolt.name: Dragonfang Bolt
Dragonfang Bolt.flavor: Venomous fangs hurtle toward your foes, piercing their flesh and then poisoning them.
Dragonfang Bolt.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier damage, and ongoing 5 poison damage (save ends).

Lightning Breath.name: Lightning Breath
Lightning Breath.flavor: You exhale a blast of lightning at your foes. The lightning then forms a ring around you, repelling nearby attackers.
Lightning Breath.effect: Until the end of your next turn, whenever an enemy hits you with a melee attack, you push that enemy 1 square.
Lightning Breath.dragonMagic: The enemy also takes 5 lightning damage.

Stretch Spell.name: Stretch Spell
Stretch Spell.flavor: You bend space to increase the extent of your spell.
Stretch Spell.effect: Until the end of your turn, add your Dexterity modifier to the range of your ranged arcane powers.

Unseen Aid.name: Unseen Aid
Unseen Aid.flavor: Invisible forces aid you in mysterious ways.
Unseen Aid.effect: You gain a +2 bonus to a skill check you make this turn.

Dancing Lightning.name: Dancing Lightning
Dancing Lightning.flavor: As lightning strikes your foe, thunder batters creatures around it.
Dancing Lightning.onHit: 2d10 + Charisma modifier lightning damage, and each creature adjacent to the target takes thunder damage equal to your Charisma modifier.

Poisonous Exhalation.name: Poisonous Exhalation
Poisonous Exhalation.flavor: A cloud of poisonous vapor billows from your mouth to sap your enemies’ endurance.
Poisonous Exhalation.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier poison damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to Fortitude until the end of your next turn.
Poisonous Exhalation.dragonMagic: The penalty to Fortitude equals 1 + your Strength modifier.

Spectral Claw.name: Spectral Claw
Spectral Claw.flavor: A claw of force crushes your foe in its grip.
Spectral Claw.onHit: 1d8 + Charisma modifier force damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Spectral Claw.wildMagic: If you rolled an even number on the attack roll, you slide the target a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier.

Acidic Implantation.name: Acidic Implantation
Acidic Implantation.flavor: You implant a bubble of acid in a foe and hurl the foe into its allies. The bubble then explodes.
Acidic Implantation.onHit: You slide the primary target 3 squares.
Acidic Implantation.effect: The primary target takes 2d6 acid damage. Make a secondary attack that is an area burst 1 centered on the primary target.

Reeling Torment.name: Reeling Torment
Reeling Torment.flavor: Your hold on your enemy’s mind lets you move your foe, tormented by spasms, around the battlefield.
Reeling Torment.onHit: 3d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage. At the start of each of the target’s turns, you can slide the target 3 squares as a free action (save ends).
Reeling Torment.onMiss: Half damage. At the start of each of the target’s turns, you can slide the target 1 square as a free action (save ends).

Thunder Leap.name: Thunder Leap
Thunder Leap.flavor: A thunderclap propels you into the air, and you land with a deafening crack, pushing your foes away.
Thunder Leap.effect: You jump a number of squares equal to your speed + your Charisma modifier. This movement does not provoke opportunity attacks. Then make a secondary attack.
Thunder Leap.secondaryOnHit: 2d6 thunder damage, and you push the secondary target 1 square.

Arcane Empowerment.name: Arcane Empowerment
Arcane Empowerment.flavor: You force additional energy into your spells.
Arcane Empowerment.effect: Until the end of your turn, increase the size of your arcane powers’ blasts and bursts by 1.

Energetic Flight.name: Energetic Flight
Energetic Flight.flavor: You hurtle forward on wings shaped from streamers of dancing energy.
Energetic Flight.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a fly speed equal to your speed, and you can hover.

Sudden Scales.name: Sudden Scales
Sudden Scales.flavor: Dragon scales cover your form in reaction to an assault, as arcane power shields your mind and body from harm.
Sudden Scales.trigger: You are hit by an attack
Sudden Scales.effect: You gain a +4 bonus to all defenses against the triggering attack.
Sudden Scales.dragonMagic: The bonus to all defenses equals 3 + your Strength modifier.

Chaos Storm.name: Chaos Storm
Chaos Storm.flavor: A storm of lightning pounds your enemies. When the storm clears, everyone has teleported to new positions by your magic.
Chaos Storm.effect: You teleport each target hit by the attack so that it swaps positions with another target hit by the attack.
Chaos Storm.wildMagic: You instead teleport each target hit by the attack to any other space within the burst.

Contagious Curse.name: Contagious Curse
Contagious Curse.flavor: A cloud of poison gas coils around your foe, warding off help.
Contagious Curse.effect: You slide the target a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier. The target is poisonous to your enemies (save ends). While the target is poisonous, any enemy that starts its turn adjacent to the target takes 1d10 poison damage.
Contagious Curse.wildMagic: If you rolled an even number on the attack roll, any enemy that starts its turn within 2 squares of the poisonous target takes 1d10 poison damage.

Staggering Blast.name: Staggering Blast
Staggering Blast.flavor: Your mental assault leaves your foe reeling. With a thought, you can force the foe to the ground if it tries to move.
Staggering Blast.onHit: 3d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage. If the target moves before the end of your next turn, you can knock the target prone during that movement as an immediate interrupt.
Staggering Blast.onMiss: Half damage, and you knock the target prone.

Chaos Link.name: Chaos Link
Chaos Link.flavor: You bend the fabric of reality to bind an enemy’s fate to yours.
Chaos Link.trigger: You are hit by an area or a close attack
Chaos Link.effect: The triggering attack also hits the target.

Narrow Escape.name: Narrow Escape
Narrow Escape.flavor: You teleport away from your foe and reduce the force of its attack.
Narrow Escape.trigger: You are hit by an attack
Narrow Escape.effect: You take half damage from the attack. You then teleport a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier + your Dexterity modifier.

Chains of Fire.name: Chains of Fire
Chains of Fire.flavor: Fiery serpents wrap around your foes and drag them together, holding them close.
Chains of Fire.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier fire damage. If you hit two targets with this power, you teleport one of them to a space that must be adjacent to the other, and until the end of your next turn, the two targets take 1d10 fire damage the first time they are more than 3 squares apart.

Jaws of the Earth.name: Jaws of the Earth
Jaws of the Earth.flavor: The earth rises up like the maw of a hungry dragon to clamp around your foe and hold it in place.
Jaws of the Earth.onHit: 3d6 + Charisma modifier damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn. While the target is immobilized by this power, you and your allies can move through the target’s space and don’t provoke opportunity attacks from it by leaving a square adjacent to it.

Mind Hammer.name: Mind Hammer
Mind Hammer.flavor: Howling chaos slams into your foe’s mind and throws the creature to the ground.
Mind Hammer.onHit: 2d10 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and you knock the target prone.
Mind Hammer.wildMagic: If you rolled an even number on the attack roll, the target can’t stand up until the end of your next turn. If you rolled an odd number on the attack roll, you slide the target a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier.

Thunder Breath.name: Thunder Breath
Thunder Breath.flavor: A blast of thunder like a dragon’s roar issues from your mouth, staggering your foes.
Thunder Breath.onHit: 2d6 + Charisma modifier thunder damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Thunder Breath.dragonMagic: The target is also slowed until the end of your next turn.

Frost Eddies.name: Frost Eddies
Frost Eddies.flavor: Cold slams into your foe, leaving a whirling storm of frost lingering around it.
Frost Eddies.effect: Until the end of the encounter, wherever the target moves, each square adjacent to it is difficult terrain for your enemies.

Hostility Charm.name: Hostility Charm
Hostility Charm.flavor: You cloud your foe’s senses so that it questions which creatures are its allies.
Hostility Charm.onHit: 5d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and as a free action, the target charges your enemy nearest to it that it can charge and makes a melee basic attack.
Hostility Charm.wildMagic: If you rolled an even number on the attack roll, your enemies can provoke opportunity attacks from the target, and the target must make any opportunity attack that they provoke (save ends).

Scintillating Starburst.name: Scintillating Starburst
Scintillating Starburst.flavor: A brilliant mote of magic streaks toward your foe and explodes.
Scintillating Starburst.onHit: 4d6 + Charisma modifier radiant damage, and the target is blinded (save ends).

Spitfire Furnace.name: Spitfire Furnace
Spitfire Furnace.flavor: After unleashing a blast of flames, you smolder with heat, and no one dares approach you.
Spitfire Furnace.effect: Until the end of the encounter, any enemy that starts its turn within 2 squares of you takes 3 fire damage.
Spitfire Furnace.dragonMagic: Until the end of the encounter, any enemy that starts its turn within 2 squares of you instead takes fire damage equal to 2 + your Strength modifier.

Chaos Echoes.name: Chaos Echoes
Chaos Echoes.flavor: You warp the natural laws of cause and effect to make an enemy feel the effects of an attack against you.
Chaos Echoes.trigger: You are hit or missed by an attack
Chaos Echoes.effect: The triggering attack hits the target.

Chaos Sanctuary.name: Chaos Sanctuary
Chaos Sanctuary.flavor: You create small pockets of chaos to warp the energy of your next spell around your allies.
Chaos Sanctuary.effect: Choose a number of squares in the burst equal to your Dexterity modifier. Until the end of your turn, any creature whose space is entirely in those squares is not affected by your area or close arcane powers.

Comrades' Mantle.name: Comrades' Mantle
Comrades' Mantle.flavor: You share your resistance with your allies.
Comrades' Mantle.target: You and each ally in the burst
Comrades' Mantle.effect: Choose a damage type: acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, necrotic, poison, psychic, radiant, or thunder. Each target gains resist 5 to that damage type until the end of the encounter.

Breath of Winter.name: Breath of Winter
Breath of Winter.flavor: You exhale a blast of freezing wind to slow your enemies’ movement.
Breath of Winter.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier cold damage, and the target is slowed until the end of its next turn.

Poisonous Evasion.name: Poisonous Evasion
Poisonous Evasion.flavor: You disappear as your enemy misses, leaving a cloud of poison behind.
Poisonous Evasion.trigger: An enemy misses you with an attack

Baleful Gaze of the Basilisk.name: Baleful Gaze of the Basilisk
Baleful Gaze of the Basilisk.flavor: You cast a toxic glance at your foe, leaving it paralyzed with fear.
Baleful Gaze of the Basilisk.onHit: The target is stunned and takes ongoing 10 poison damage (save ends both).
Baleful Gaze of the Basilisk.dragonMagic: When the target saves against the ongoing poison damage, you slide the target a number of squares equal to your Strength modifier.

Blackfire Serpent.name: Blackfire Serpent
Blackfire Serpent.flavor: A coiled serpent made of black flames appears among your enemies and unleashes a blast of fire.
Blackfire Serpent.effect:
You conjure a blackfire serpent in an unoccupied square within range. The serpent lasts until the end of your next turn. The serpent occupies 1 square. Enemies cannot move through its space, but allies can.
    When it appears, the serpent makes the following attack, which is a close blast 3. As a move action, you can move the serpent a number of squares equal to your Strength modifier.
Blackfire Serpent.sustainMinor: The snake persists, and it can repeat the attack.

Prismatic Explosion.name: Prismatic Explosion
Prismatic Explosion.flavor: You batter a group of enemies with dazzling colors, each color causing a different effect.
Prismatic Explosion.onHit:
3d12 + Charisma modifier damage. Roll a d6 for each target to determine the attack’s damage type and effect.
1. Yellow: Radiant damage, and the target is blinded (save ends).
2. Red: Fire damage, and the target is knocked prone and takes ongoing 10 fire damage (save ends).
3. Green: Poison damage, and the target takes ongoing 15 poison damage (save ends).
4. Turquoise: Lightning damage, and you knock the target prone and slide it a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier.
5. Blue: Cold damage, and the target is stunned (save ends).
6. Violet: Psychic damage, and the target takes a penalty to AC equal to your Dexterity modifier (save ends).
Prismatic Explosion.onMiss: 2d12 damage. Roll a d6 for each target to determine the attack’s damage type and effect, as above.

Split Strike.name: Split Strike
Split Strike.flavor: A bolt of lightning leaps from each of your hands.
Split Strike.wildMagic: If you rolled an even number on the attack roll, the target is immobilized (save ends). If you rolled an odd number on the attack roll, the target is dazed (save ends).

Dragon Fear.name: Dragon Fear
Dragon Fear.flavor: You stop your enemy in its tracks.
Dragon Fear.trigger: A creature moves closer to you during its turn
Dragon Fear.effect: The target can’t move closer to you until the end of its turn.

Platinum Scales.name: Platinum Scales
Platinum Scales.flavor: You gleam with platinum-tinted dragon scales of energy.
Platinum Scales.trigger: You are hit by an attack
Platinum Scales.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a power bonus to all defenses equal to your Strength modifier.

Shared Sorcery.name: Shared Sorcery
Shared Sorcery.flavor: A shimmering emanation of sorcerous energy protects your friends from harm.
Shared Sorcery.target: You and each ally in the burst
Shared Sorcery.effect: Choose a damage type: acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, necrotic, poison, psychic, radiant, or thunder. Each target gains resist 10 to that damage type until the end of the encounter.

Wind Shape.name: Wind Shape
Wind Shape.flavor: You become a creature of air and rushing wind.
Wind Shape.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you become insubstantial, you gain a fly speed equal to your speed, and you can hover.

Black Breath.name: Black Breath
Black Breath.flavor: You exhale a blast of acid, drawing on the power of the fearsome black dragon to sear your enemy and limit its vision.
Black Breath.dragonMagic: Until the end of your next turn, the target doesn’t have line of sight to any creature more than 3 squares away from it.

Chaos Orbs.name: Chaos Orbs
Chaos Orbs.flavor: You hurl two orbs of chaos at your foes.
Chaos Orbs.onHit: 3d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Iron Chains.name: Iron Chains
Iron Chains.flavor: Smoking chains of black iron appear and wrap around your target, then snake outward to bind all nearby creatures.
Iron Chains.onHit: 2d6 + Charisma modifier damage, and the target and each creature adjacent to it are restrained until the end of your next turn.

Cloak of Winter Storm.name: Cloak of Winter Storm
Cloak of Winter Storm.flavor: Cold explodes around you, and the air coalesces into whirling shards of ice.
Cloak of Winter Storm.effect: The burst creates a zone of floating ice shards that lasts until the end of the encounter. Each enemy that enters the zone or starts its turn there takes 2d6 + your Charisma modifier cold damage and is slowed until the end of its turn. An enemy can take this damage only once per turn.

Draconic Incarnation.name: Draconic Incarnation
Draconic Incarnation.flavor: Calling on the full power of the arcane forces that flow through you, you stand within a vortex of devastating energy.
Draconic Incarnation.onHit: 7d6 + Charisma modifier damage. Choose a damage type: acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder. The attack deals damage of this type to each target.
Draconic Incarnation.dragonMagic: Until the end of the encounter, once during each of your turns, you can slide one enemy within 3 squares of you 2 squares as a free action.

Force Storm.name: Force Storm
Force Storm.flavor: Bolts of force swirl in the area like a deadly tornado, stealing energy from each enemy to empower themselves.
Force Storm.onHit: 3d6 + Charisma modifier force damage. The attack deals 5 extra force damage for each target it hits.

Lightning Eruption.name: Lightning Eruption
Lightning Eruption.flavor: Lightning crackles over your victim and arcs into nearby enemies.
Lightning Eruption.onHit: 3d12 + Charisma modifier lightning damage, and each enemy adjacent to the target takes 1d12 + your Charisma modifier lightning damage.

Poison Ward.name: Poison Ward
Poison Ward.flavor: You lance a foe with poison, which coils in the foe’s heart to punish any aggression against you.
Poison Ward.onHit: 4d10 + Charisma modifier poison damage. If the target moves closer to you or hits or misses you during its next turn, the target takes 2d10 poison damage.

Thunder Pulse.name: Thunder Pulse
Thunder Pulse.flavor: You stomp a foot on the ground, and the resulting shock wave hurls your enemies away.
Thunder Pulse.onHit: 3d6 + Charisma modifier thunder damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier and knock it prone.

Wildfire Curse.name: Wildfire Curse
Wildfire Curse.flavor: As your foe bursts into flame, a fiery mote flies at another foe nearby.
Wildfire Curse.onHit: 4d6 + Charisma modifier fire damage. Make a secondary attack.
Wildfire Curse.secondaryTarget: One creature within 5 squares of the target last hit by this power
Wildfire Curse.secondaryOnHit: 4d6 + Charisma modifier fire damage. Repeat the secondary attack against a creature you haven’t already targeted with this power during this encounter.

Endless Acid.name: Endless Acid
Endless Acid.flavor: Acid bubbles up from inside your foe, searing its flesh and resisting attempts to scrape it off.
Endless Acid.onHit: 1d6 + Charisma modifier acid damage, and ongoing 15 acid damage (save ends).

Entropic Whirlwind.name: Entropic Whirlwind
Entropic Whirlwind.flavor: Chaos swirls around you, opening and sealing holes in the fabric of reality to move your foes and allies as you wish.
Entropic Whirlwind.onHit: 3d8 + Charisma modifier damage, and you teleport the target a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier. The target again takes 3d8 + your Charisma modifier damage whenever it teleports (save ends).
Entropic Whirlwind.effect: Until the end of the encounter, when any creature ends its turn within 5 squares of you, you can teleport the creature to any space within 5 squares of you as an immediate reaction.

Prismatic Storm.name: Prismatic Storm
Prismatic Storm.flavor: The sky rains down a rainbow of destruction.
Prismatic Storm.onHit:
5d8 + Charisma modifier damage. Roll a d6 for each target to determine the attack’s damage type and effect.
1. Yellow: Radiant damage, and the target is blinded and takes a -2 penalty to saving throws (save ends both).
2. Red: Fire damage, and the target is knocked prone and takes ongoing 15 fire damage (save ends).
3. Green: Poison damage, and the target takes ongoing 20 poison damage (save ends).
4. Turquoise: Lightning damage, and you knock the target prone and slide it a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier. In addition, the target is dazed (saved ends).
5. Blue: Cold damage, and the target is stunned (save ends).
6. Violet: Psychic damage, and the target takes a penalty to AC and Reflex equal to your Dexterity modifier (save ends).
Prismatic Storm.onMiss: 3d8 damage. Roll a d6 for each target to determine the attack’s damage type and effect, as above.

Swift Escape.name: Swift Escape
Swift Escape.flavor: A quick reaction saves you from the explosion.
Swift Escape.trigger: You are hit by an area or a close attack
Swift Escape.wildMagic: The number of squares you teleport equals 2 + your Dexterity modifier.

Draconic Majesty.name: Draconic Majesty
Draconic Majesty.flavor: As your foes draw near you, fear steals into their hearts.
Draconic Majesty.effect: The burst creates a zone of fear that lasts until the end of your next turn. When you move, the zone moves with you, remaining centered on you. The zone is difficult terrain for your enemies. While within the zone, any enemy takes a penalty to attack rolls equal to your Strength modifier.

Words of Chaos.name: Words of Chaos
Words of Chaos.flavor: A wave of chaos assaults your enemy’s mind. When the enemy attacks, you bend reality to redirect the attack.
Words of Chaos.onHit: The target must choose a different creature to target with its attack if it can. Otherwise, its attack is unaffected by this secondary attack.
Words of Chaos.effect: When the target makes an attack roll for a melee or a ranged attack, you can use the Words of Chaos Attack power against the target if it is within 10 squares of you (save ends).
Words of Chaos.requirement: The Words of Chaos power must be active to use this power.
Words of Chaos.wildMagic: If you rolled an even number on the secondary attack roll, you choose the creature that the target attacks.

Blazing Starfall.name: Blazing Starfall
Blazing Starfall.flavor: A shower of radiance falls upon your enemies and then bursts out, creating a cage of burning embers that are painful to pass through.
Blazing Starfall.onHit:
1d4 + Charisma modifier radiant damage.
Level 21: 2d4 + Charisma modifier radiant damage.
Blazing Starfall.cosmicMagic: The burst creates a zone bounded by burning ground that lasts until the end of your next turn. The first time each turn that an enemy within the zone leaves it, that enemy takes fire damage equal to your Strength modifier.

Pinning Bolt.name: Pinning Bolt
Pinning Bolt.flavor: You launch tendrils of blue, crackling energy that knock your enemy to the ground and inhibit its movement.
Pinning Bolt.onHit: 2d6 + Charisma modifier lightning damage, you knock the target prone, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

Ray of the Moon.name: Ray of the Moon
Ray of the Moon.flavor: A ray of cold moonlight shines down from above, momentarily disorienting your opponent.
Ray of the Moon.onHit: 2d6 + Charisma modifier cold damage, and the target cannot shift until the end of its next turn.
Ray of the Moon.cosmicMagic: The target takes a -1 penalty on attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

Cosmos Call.name: Cosmos Call
Cosmos Call.flavor: You access the variety of cycles within the cosmos, randomly pulling out a fundamental force to blast your enemy’s mind.
Cosmos Call.onHit:
2d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage. Roll a d6 to determine the attack’s additional benefit.
1–2: The target takes ongoing 5 radiant damage (save ends), and the power gains the radiant keyword.
3–4: The target is slowed (save ends).
5–6: The target is dazed (save ends).
Cosmos Call.cosmicMagic: You choose the attack’s additional benefit instead of rolling.

Shocking Magnetism.name: Shocking Magnetism
Shocking Magnetism.flavor: You become a conduit for lightning. The pulsing energy  ccumulates within your body, enabling you to shock those who come near.
Shocking Magnetism.onHit: 3d6 + Charisma modifier lightning damage, and you pull the target a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier.
Shocking Magnetism.effect: Until the end of the encounter, each creature that starts its turn adjacent to you takes lightning damage equal to your Dexterity modifier. You can dismiss the effect as a free action.

Focused Chaos.name: Focused Chaos
Focused Chaos.flavor: To make chaos work for you, you must exercise a bit of control, but not too much. On your next spell, you manage to achieve the outcome you desire.
Focused Chaos.trigger: You use a sorcerer power that works differently depending on whether the attack roll is odd or even
Focused Chaos.effect: You choose to treat that power’s attack roll as either odd or even, regardless of your actual roll.

Corruption Orb.name: Corruption Orb
Corruption Orb.flavor: You fling a disgusting orb of green and ocher slime that drenches your enemy with a debilitating, acidic poison.
Corruption Orb.effect: The target takes ongoing 5 acid damage (save ends).

Moon and the Stars.name: Moon and the Stars
Moon and the Stars.flavor: A chill winter moon appears overhead, and around it swims a myriad of radiant stars. You can unleash the power of either on a foe.
Moon and the Stars.onHit: 3d6 + Charisma modifier cold or radiant damage. The damage type you choose determines the attack’s additional benefit.
Moon and the Stars.cold: The target is slowed and cannot shift (save ends both).
Moon and the Stars.radiant: You can spend one healing surge (even if you hit two targets).
Moon and the Stars.onMiss: Half damage (your choice of cold or radiant).

Slaad's Gambit.name: Slaad's Gambit
Slaad's Gambit.flavor: You tap into chaos just as a foe is about to hit you. A greenish hue flickers across your skin as you teleport away, then make your own attack.
Slaad's Gambit.trigger: An enemy within 5 squares of you hits you
Slaad's Gambit.effect: Before the attack, you teleport your speed.

Sun's Illumination.name: Sun's Illumination
Sun's Illumination.flavor: Radiance pours down on an area, burning creatures within the light and revealing them to you in both body and mind.
Sun's Illumination.effect: The burst creates a zone of piercing light that lasts until the end of your next turn. You gain a +2 power bonus to Insight and Perception checks against each creature within the zone. Each enemy within the zone grants combat advantage. As a move action, you can move the zone 3 squares.

Fate's Chaos.name: Fate's Chaos
Fate's Chaos.flavor: You tweak the course of fate, turning ill luck into good fortune.
Fate's Chaos.trigger: You spend an action point to make an attack and miss
Fate's Chaos.effect: Reroll the triggering attack roll with a bonus equal to your Strength modifier.

Lightning Shift.name: Lightning Shift
Lightning Shift.flavor: With a flourish of snapping sparks, your single step speeds you, lightning-quick, across the battlefield.
Lightning Shift.effect: You shift your speed. You ignore difficult terrain during the shift.

Subtlety of the Green Wyrm.name: Subtlety of the Green Wyrm
Subtlety of the Green Wyrm.flavor: You listen for the faint whisper of your own blood. In its flow, you find ancient wisdom and unrivaled charm.
Subtlety of the Green Wyrm.effect: You gain a +5 power bonus to Diplomacy checks, Insight checks, and Intimidate checks until the end of the encounter.

Thunder Bomb.name: Thunder Bomb
Thunder Bomb.flavor: You open your palm, revealing a sphere of arcane energy that speeds across the battlefield and detonates, leaving your foes thunderstruck.
Thunder Bomb.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier thunder damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn. If the target is in the origin square of the burst, it is immobilized until the end of your next turn instead of slowed.

Howling Hurricane.name: Howling Hurricane
Howling Hurricane.flavor: The cries of the wind compete with the sound of thunder as you bring forth a screaming vortex that spins your foes about.
Howling Hurricane.onHit: 3d8 + Charisma modifier thunder damage, and you slide the target a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier.
Howling Hurricane.effect: The burst creates a zone of swirling wind that lasts until the end of your next turn. You slide each creature that starts its turn within the zone 2 squares. As a move action, you can move the zone 6 squares.

Season's Malaise.name: Season's Malaise
Season's Malaise.flavor: Dark clouds appear over your foes, and you assault their minds with a psychic attack that causes depression and lethargy.
Season's Malaise.effect: The target takes ongoing 5 psychic damage (save ends). Until the target saves against this damage, it cannot take immediate actions or opportunity actions.

Dragon's Resolve.name: Dragon's Resolve
Dragon's Resolve.flavor: Your blood boils with the wrath of a dragon, giving you greater fury and power when the situation seems most dire.
Dragon's Resolve.effect: Until the end of the encounter, while you are bloodied, you gain a +1 power bonus to attack rolls and a power bonus to saving throws equal to your Charisma modifier.

Spirit's Eclipse.name: Spirit's Eclipse
Spirit's Eclipse.flavor: A mental bulwark helps to protect you against your foe’s attack and renders the creature incapable of seeing you for a time.
Spirit's Eclipse.trigger: An enemy hits you with an attack that targets Will
Spirit's Eclipse.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a +5 bonus to Will and are invisible to the triggering enemy.

Storm of Energy.name: Storm of Energy
Storm of Energy.flavor: With a wave of your hand, you increase the vigor of whatever effects ail your foes.
Storm of Energy.target: Each enemy in the burst that is taking ongoing damage
Storm of Energy.effect: Each instance of ongong damage that each target is taking increases by 10.

Cyclone Pull.name: Cyclone Pull
Cyclone Pull.flavor: From the ground rises a cyclone that consumes your foes in violence, battering them and pulling them toward its center.
Cyclone Pull.target: One, two, or three creatures in the burst
Cyclone Pull.onHit: 1d6 + Charisma modifier damage, and you slide the target 2 squares closer to the origin square of the burst.

Dazzling Starlight.name: Dazzling Starlight
Dazzling Starlight.flavor: The stars send shafts of light down upon your foe, blasting its mind and leaving it confounded.
Dazzling Starlight.onHit: 3d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target cannot take immediate actions or opportunity actions.
Dazzling Starlight.cosmicMagic: If you use this power while you are in the phase of the stars, the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Moon Cage.name: Moon Cage
Moon Cage.flavor: You call upon the moon and gain a fraction of its strength. Using it, you reach out and clutch your foe in a cold cage.
Moon Cage.onHit: 1d10 + Charisma modifier cold damage, and the target is restrained until the end of your next turn.
Moon Cage.cosmicMagic: If you use this power while you are in the phase of the moon, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Strength modifier.

Primordial Storm.name: Primordial Storm
Primordial Storm.flavor: You pull a fragment of the Elemental Chaos into the world and let its fury wash over your foes.
keywords: Arcane, Cold, Fire, Implement, Lightning, Thunder
Primordial Storm.stormMagic: You can choose not to target a creature in the origin square of the burst.
Primordial Storm.onHit: 2d6 + Charisma modifier lightning and thunder damage. At the start of the target’s next turn, it takes 5 cold and fire damage.
Primordial Storm.wildMagic: If you rolled an even number on the attack roll, the target takes 10 cold and fire damage at the start of its next turn instead of 5. If you rolled an odd number on the attack roll, the target is also slowed until the end of its next turn.

Day and Night.name: Day and Night
Day and Night.flavor: Your arcane litany calls a blaze of brilliance and a shroud of chill shadow across your foe in quick succession.
Day and Night.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier radiant damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).
Day and Night.effect: Make a secondary attack against the target.
Day and Night.secondaryOnHit: 3d6 + Charisma modifier cold damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).

Gale Burst.name: Gale Burst
Gale Burst.flavor: Your words of bring forth an explosive cloud from the heart of a gale. Your foes are flung about like leaves in a tempest.
Gale Burst.onHit: 4d8 + Charisma modifier thunder damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier. The target is slowed (save ends).
Gale Burst.onMiss: Half damage, and you push the target 1 square.

Breath of Potency.name: Breath of Potency
Breath of Potency.flavor: You call upon your draconic lineage to bolster you against harm.
Breath of Potency.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +1 power bonus to all defenses. Whenever you use an arcane close attack, this bonus is equal to your Strength modifier until the end of your next turn.

Thunder Buffer.name: Thunder Buffer
Thunder Buffer.flavor: Distant thunder grumbles around you, and you can unleash it against an attacker to knock the creature backward.
Thunder Buffer.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +2 power bonus to AC, and as an immediate reaction you can push each enemy that hits you with a melee attack a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier.

Searing Radiance.name: Searing Radiance
Searing Radiance.flavor: You borrow a bit of the sun’s radiance and hurl it at your foe.
Searing Radiance.cosmicMagic: If you use this power while you are in the phase of the sun, you can spend a healing surge.

Primordial Slime.name: Primordial Slime
Primordial Slime.flavor: With a flick of your wrist, you shoot an ooze at your foe. When the ooze strikes, the creature begins to take on a gelatinous consistency.
Primordial Slime.onHit: The target is slowed, cannot take standard actions, and takes half damage from melee and ranged attacks (save ends all).
Primordial Slime.aftereffect: The target is slowed and takes ongoing 10 acid damage (save ends both).
Primordial Slime.wildMagic: If you rolled an even number on the attack roll, the target takes a -2 penalty to all defenses until the aftereffect ends. If you rolled an odd number on the attack roll, the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the aftereffect ends.
Primordial Slime.onMiss: The target is slowed and takes ongoing 10 acid damage (save ends both).

Crown of Flames.name: Crown of Flames
Crown of Flames.flavor: You adorn yourself with a halo of fire that flickers and dances. Whenever your lesser spells fail, the flames lick your foes.
Crown of Flames.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever you miss with a sorcerer at-will or encounter attack power, the target takes fire damage equal to your Charisma modifier.

Rumbling Storm Bolt.name: Rumbling Storm Bolt
Rumbling Storm Bolt.flavor: You strike a foe with lightning, sending it staggering. Then a thunder wave rolls in, smashing into a nearby creature.
Rumbling Storm Bolt.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier lightning damage, and you slide the target a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier. Make a secondary attack.
Rumbling Storm Bolt.secondaryTarget: One creature within 10 squares of the primary target and in the primary target’s line of sight
Rumbling Storm Bolt.secondaryOnHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier thunder damage, and you knock the target prone.

Sun and Stars.name: Sun and Stars
Sun and Stars.flavor: With the force of the solar tide, you blast your foe with a gout of energy that requires both endurance and quickness to withstand.
Sun and Stars.onHit: 2d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
Sun and Stars.effect: Make a secondary attack against the target.
Sun and Stars.cosmicMagic: If you hit with both attacks, you can change your phase in the cosmic cycle to the phase of the sun or the phase of the stars.

Wildrift Burst.name: Wildrift Burst
Wildrift Burst.flavor: You scream an arcane word that resonates in your foes’ minds. The world around you then fractures, causing space to distort.
Wildrift Burst.onHit: 3d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and you teleport the target a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier.
Wildrift Burst.wildMagic: If you rolled an even number on the attack roll, the target is dazed until the end of your next turn. If you rolled an odd number on the attack roll, you can teleport the target an additional 1d4 squares.

Moonstruck.name: Moonstruck
Moonstruck.flavor: Your foes are captivated by a vision of the moon, cold and enduring. The image strikes their hearts, leaving them paralyzed.
Moonstruck.onHit: 4d6 + Charisma modifier cold damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Moonstruck.cosmicMagic: If you use this power while you are in the phase of the moon, the target is restrained instead of immobilized.

Mother Claw.name: Mother Claw
Mother Claw.flavor: A talon of force slashes at a foe that threatens you, then pushes you back to safety like a dragon matriarch protecting its young.
Mother Claw.trigger: An enemy hits or misses you with a melee attack
Mother Claw.onHit: 4d8 + Charisma modifier force damage, and you can shift a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier.
Mother Claw.dragonMagic: You ignore difficult terrain when you shift with this power.

Cosmic Vengeance.name: Cosmic Vengeance
Cosmic Vengeance.flavor: Your foes become locked to the cycle of the sun, the moon, and the stars. This connection makes them suffer for attacking you.
Cosmic Vengeance.effect: Until the end of the encounter, an enemy within 5 squares of you that hits you with an attack takes cold, psychic, or radiant damage (your choice with each hit) equal to your Charisma modifier. If that hit was also a critical hit, the enemy also takes ongoing 5 damage of the corresponding type (save ends).
Cosmic Vengeance.cosmicMagic: Add your Strength modifier to the damage dealt to an enemy that hits you.

Hellish Firestorm.name: Hellish Firestorm
Hellish Firestorm.flavor: You call up the heart of a firestorm from the Elemental Chaos and drop the devastating phenomenon upon your foes.
Hellish Firestorm.stormMagic: You can choose not to target a creature in the origin square of the burst.
Hellish Firestorm.onHit: 3d10 + Charisma modifier thunder damage, and ongoing 10 fire damage (save ends).
Hellish Firestorm.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends).

Mind Tide.name: Mind Tide
Mind Tide.flavor: Your foe’s mind is like the ocean, able to be influenced by cosmic forces. By wielding those forces, you can seize control of it.
Mind Tide.onHit: 4d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target is dominated (save ends).
Mind Tide.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Wyrm Form.name: Wyrm Form
Wyrm Form.flavor: Your heart is that of an ancient dragon, and now your body is as well.
Wyrm Form.requirement: The Wyrm Form power must be active to use this power.
Wyrm Form.effect: Until the end of the encounter or until you are bloodied, you take the form of a huge black, blue, green, red, or white dragon (your choice when you use this power). You retain your statistics, hit points, and defenses, but you have a speed of 8, fly 10 (hover). You can use your arcane powers while in this form, and you gain the Wyrm Forme Basic Bite Attack power, Wyrm Form Breath Weapon power, and Wyrm Form Reactive Attack power.
Wyrm Form.dragonMagic: You gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls on the attacks granted by this power.

Thunder Summons.name: Thunder Summons
Thunder Summons.flavor: Thunderous crashes hurl your enemies around in a storm of chaos.
Thunder Summons.onHit: 3d8 + Charisma modifier thunder damage, and you teleport the target to a space adjacent to your enemy that is nearest to it.
Thunder Summons.wildMagic: If you rolled an even number on the attack roll, you can teleport the target to a space adjacent to your ally, not your enemy, who is nearest to it.

Plates of Ice.name: Plates of Ice
Plates of Ice.flavor: Icy plates form over your enemy’s body, draining its strength.
Plates of Ice.onHit: 4d6 + Charisma modifier cold damage, and the target is weakened until the end of your next turn.
Plates of Ice.wildMagic: If you rolled an even number on the attack roll, each creature adjacent to the target takes 1d6 cold damage.

Blazing Bolts.name: Blazing Bolts
Blazing Bolts.flavor: Two bolts of violet lightning erupt from your hands, causing a shower of white-hot, flaming sparks where they hit.
Blazing Bolts.onHit: 1d8 + Charisma modifier lightning damage, and the target and each creature adjacent to it take fire damage equal to your Strength modifier.

Stalking Frost.name: Stalking Frost
Stalking Frost.flavor: A wave of utter cold sweeps outward, seeping into the bones of your foes. If your enemies don’t move, the cold grows more deadly.
Stalking Frost.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier cold damage. If the target does not end its next turn at least 4 squares away from where it started its turn, it takes 10 cold damage.

Aspect of the Dragon.name: Aspect of the Dragon
Aspect of the Dragon.flavor: Your form wavers and is replaced by a dragon that releases a scouring blast of fire. Depending on the course of the battle, it might make another appearance.
Aspect of the Dragon.effect: The first time you become bloodied during the encounter, repeat the attack as a free action.
Aspect of the Dragon.dragonMagic: You gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls with this repeated attack.

Radiant Wings.name: Radiant Wings
Radiant Wings.flavor: You rise into the air, borne aloft by rays of golden sunlight that simultaneously blast your foe.
Radiant Wings.effect: Before the attack, you can fly a number of squares equal to your Strength modifier.
Radiant Wings.cosmicMagic: At the end of this movement, each creature adjacent to you takes fire and radiant damage equal to your Strength modifier.
Radiant Wings.onHit: 3d8 + Charisma modifier fire and radiant damage.
Radiant Wings.sustainMinor: When you sustain this power, repeat the effect.

Wrathful Vapors.name: Wrathful Vapors
Wrathful Vapors.flavor: Vapors shoot forth from your outstretched arms, freezing or scorching each enemy they hit.
keywords: Acid, Arcane, Cold, Implement, Lightning, Thunder
Wrathful Vapors.target: Each creature in the burst  (choose one defense for each target)
Wrathful Vapors.onHit: 3d6 + Charisma modifier lightning damage. Each creature adjacent to the target takes 2d6 + your Dexterity modifier acid damage.

Arcing Fire.name: Arcing Fire
Arcing Fire.flavor: You lob a blast of fire past intervening foes that scorches them on the way to your target.
Arcing Fire.onHit:
1d8 + Charisma modifier fire damage. Any enemy providing the target cover against this attack takes fire damage equal to your Charisma modifier.
Increase damage to 2d8 + Charisma modifier at 21st level.

Grounding Rebuke.name: Grounding Rebuke
Grounding Rebuke.flavor: You take the energy of your enemy’s attack and channel it back toward your foe, knocking it aside and binding it to the earth.
Grounding Rebuke.trigger: An enemy in the area hits you with an attack
Grounding Rebuke.effect: Reduce the damage you take by an amount equal to your Charisma modifier.
Grounding Rebuke.onHit: 1d10 + Charisma modifier damage, and the target is slowed (save ends) and slides 2 squares.
Grounding Rebuke.onMiss: Half damage, and the target slides 1 square.

Energy Strobe.name: Energy Strobe
Energy Strobe.flavor: As a beam of energy lances from your hand or eyes, part of it swirls around you as a temporary flickering shield.
Energy Strobe.onHit:
1d10 + Charisma modifier damage. Roll a d6 to determine the attack’s damage type. You gain resist 5 against the type of damage your attack deals until the end of your next turn.
1. Cold
2. Fire
3. Force
4. Lightning
5. Radiant
6. Thunder
Level 21: 2d10 + Charisma modifier damage.
Energy Strobe.special: You can use this power as a ranged basic attack.

Teleport Bash.name: Teleport Bash
Teleport Bash.flavor: A sharp blow from your staff or dagger sends your foe flickering through the gaps between worlds. When they emerge, they erupt in thunder.
Teleport Bash.onHit: 1d8 + Charisma modifier damage, and roll a d6 to determine the distance you must teleport the creature. It must be teleported that many squares away from its original location. After the teleport, all creatures adjacent to the target take 5 thunder damage.
Teleport Bash.chaosSorcerer: You can choose to roll a d4, a d6, or a d8 for the distance of the teleport effect.

One Blow, One Echo.name: One Blow, One Echo
One Blow, One Echo.flavor: A simple stab or smash is never simple when its echo can spiral through your magic and blossom in fire or thunder.
One Blow, One Echo.onHit:
1d10 + Charisma modifier damage, and roll a d6 to determine the damage type. At the start of your next turn, deal 10 damage of the same type to one enemy within 3 squares of you.
1. Acid
2. Cold
3. Fire
4. Lightning
5. Poison
6. Thunder

Thunder and Strike.name: Thunder and Strike
Thunder and Strike.flavor: Your surprise melee blow drives the enemy away in thunder, as a lightning strike blasts a distant foe.
Thunder and Strike.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier thunder damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to 1 + your Strength modifier.
Thunder and Strike.effect: You make a secondary ranged attack. This attack does not provoke opportunity attacks.
Thunder and Strike.secondaryTarget: One creature within 10 squares of you other than the primary target
Thunder and Strike.secondaryOnHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier lightning damage. In addition, if the secondary target is adjacent to the primary target, the secondary target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Rippling Strike.name: Rippling Strike
Rippling Strike.flavor: Your slash opens a psychic connection. The spell seals the connection in pain.
Rippling Strike.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier damage, and one enemy within 5 squares of the target takes 10 psychic damage. If no other enemy creature is within 5 squares, this attack deals 1d8 extra damage to the target instead.
Rippling Strike.cosmicSorcerer: If this attack reduces one or more enemies to 0 hit points, choose an enemy within 5 squares not damaged by the attack. That enemy takes 10 psychic damage.

Shuffling Thunder.name: Shuffling Thunder
Shuffling Thunder.flavor: A blow from your staff unseals the walls between worlds. Thunderous magic announces your arrival and the arrival of the enemy you have teleported.
Shuffling Thunder.onHit: 3d8 + Charisma modifier damage, and roll a d6. You must teleport the target that distance, and you can teleport yourself that distance. After the teleport, every creature adjacent to you and every creature adjacent to the target takes 10 thunder damage.
Shuffling Thunder.chaosSorcerer: You can choose to roll a d4, d6, d8, or d10 for the distance of the teleport effect.

Sorcerous Echo.name: Sorcerous Echo
Sorcerous Echo.flavor: What seems like a relatively weak slash of your dagger turns into a blossom of acid or lightning, erupting on a foe of your choice.
Sorcerous Echo.onHit:
3d10 + Charisma modifier damage, and roll a d6 to determine the damage type. At the start of your next turn, deal 15 damage of the same type to each enemy within 3 squares of you.
1. Acid
2. Cold
3. Fire
4. Lightning
5. Poison
6. Thunder

Maiden's Waking.name: Maiden's Waking
Maiden's Waking.flavor: The Maiden of the Moon rouses you from your languor.
Maiden's Waking.trigger: You start your turn stunned, dazed, or unconscious
