Maiden's Waking.effect: You take your turn as though you were not stunned, dazed, or unconscious. At the end of your turn, the effect continues as normal.

Good Timing.name: Good Timing
Good Timing.flavor: You must have been in the right place at the right time.
Good Timing.trigger: You miss a target with a sorcerer attack power.
Good Timing.effect: Reroll the triggering attack roll. If you still miss the target even after the reroll, you take psychic damage equal to your Charisma modifier and regain the use of this power at the start of your next turn.

Gambling Siphon.name: Gambling Siphon
Gambling Siphon.flavor: You manipulate the chaos of battle surrounding an ally and transfer some of their luck to you.
Gambling Siphon.trigger: An ally within 10 squares makes an attack.
Gambling Siphon.effect: Before the ally makes his or her first attack roll for the triggering attack, choose 1–10 or 11–20. If the result on the die for the attack roll of the triggering attack is within the range selected, you gain a +5 power bonus to damage rolls until the end of your next turn. Otherwise, you gain a +2 power bonus to damage rolls until the end of your next turn.

Chaos Wager.name: Chaos Wager
Chaos Wager.flavor: “Let’s take a chance—I’ ve got a good feeling about this one.”
Chaos Wager.trigger: An ally within 5 squares makes an attack.
Chaos Wager.effect: Before the ally makes his or her first attack roll for the triggering attack, choose 1–10 or 11–20. If the result on the die for the attack roll of the triggering attack is within the range selected, you gain a power bonus to damage rolls against that target equal to 5 + your Charisma modifier until the end of your next turn.

Weave Luck.name: Weave Luck
Weave Luck.flavor: Chaos intervenes all around, creating good luck for you and misfortune for your enemies.
Weave Luck.effect: Until the end of the encounter, when you miss an enemy with an attack roll, you gain one of the following benefits: If the result of the die is even, you slide the target 1 square as a free action. If the result on the die is odd, you gain a +2 power bonus to your next attack roll made against that target before the end of your next turn.

Damage Gambit.name: Damage Gambit
Damage Gambit.flavor: With high hopes, you trust in chance to empower your attack.
Damage Gambit.effect: Reroll the damage roll, and use the new result. If the new result is higher than the triggering damage roll’s result, you deal extra damage equal to your Charisma modifier. If the new result is lower, you take psychic damage equal to your Charisma modifier.

Fool's Luck.name: Fool's Luck
Fool's Luck.flavor: “What can I say? Things just turn out my way.”
Fool's Luck.trigger: You roll a skill check, ability check, or attack roll and dislike the result.
Fool's Luck.effect: Reroll the triggering roll. If you roll a natural 20, you regain the use of this power at the end of your next turn.

Familiar Fires.name: Familiar Fires
Familiar Fires.flavor: Your magical flame flows wherever your familiar points.
Familiar Fires.activeFamiliar: If your familiar is adjacent to the target, you gain a +4 power bonus to the attack roll.

Wave of Light.name: Wave of Light
Wave of Light.flavor: A wave of multicolored light washes over your enemies, highlighting their weak points.
Wave of Light.activeFamiliar: You can choose a square in your familiar’s space instead of yours as the origin square for this attack.
Wave of Light.onHit: 2d6 + Charisma modifier radiant damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to AC until the end of your next turn.

Chaotic Strike.name: Chaotic Strike
Chaotic Strike.flavor: You close your eyes and release your magic, relying on chaos to guide it.
Chaotic Strike.onHit: 2d10 + Charisma modifier damage, and you can push the target a number of spaces equal to your Dexterity modifier. If you rolled an even number on the attack roll, the damage is acid. If you rolled an odd number on the attack roll, the damage is radiant.
Chaotic Strike.activeFamiliar: If the target is adjacent to your familiar, it takes 5 extra damage.

Spirit Guidance.name: Spirit Guidance
Spirit Guidance.flavor: You allow your magic to flow toward your familiar so that your next attack is more accurate.
Spirit Guidance.requirement: Your familiar must be in its active mode.
Spirit Guidance.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls against any creature adjacent to your familiar.

Flame Entanglement.name: Flame Entanglement
Flame Entanglement.flavor: Cords of flame leap from your hands and entwine your foe’s body.
Flame Entanglement.activeFamiliar: If your familiar is adjacent to the target, the target grants combat advantage to you for this attack.
Flame Entanglement.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier fire damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
Flame Entanglement.dragonMagic: This attack ignores fire resistance, but not immunity.

Pinning Darts.name: Pinning Darts
Pinning Darts.flavor: Barbs of force fly from your hands, pinning your enemy to the ground.
Pinning Darts.onHit: 2d10 + Charisma modifier force damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Pinning Darts.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Pinning Darts.activeFamiliar: If you rolled an even number on the attack roll, you do not expend this power if you choose to deal no damage.

Protective Familiar.name: Protective Familiar
Protective Familiar.flavor: Your familiar has a link to your soul. You can protect an ally from damage with your familiar, but you are going to feel it.
Protective Familiar.requirement: Your familiar must be in its active mode.
Protective Familiar.trigger: An attack hits an ally you can see
Protective Familiar.effect: Your familiar can shift its speed; if it ends this movement adjacent to the triggering ally, the triggering attack hits your familiar instead of the ally. You take damage equal to your level.

Horror Blast.name: Horror Blast
Horror Blast.flavor: A wave of pure terror emanates from your body and drives your enemies away.
Horror Blast.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and you push the target 2 squares.
Horror Blast.activeFamiliar: Any enemy that is adjacent to your familiar after you push it falls prone.

Flanking Familiar.name: Flanking Familiar
Flanking Familiar.flavor: Your familiar attacks one of your enemies, then runs around the battlefield aiding your allies.
Flanking Familiar.requirement: Your familiar must be in its active mode.
Flanking Familiar.effect: Until the end of the encounter, your familiar gains a power bonus to all defenses equal to your Charisma modifier. Your familiar can move its speed.
Flanking Familiar.target: One creature adjacent to your familiar
Flanking Familiar.onHit: 2d10 + Charisma modifier damage, and your familiar can flank with you and your allies until the end of your next turn.
Flanking Familiar.sustainMinor: Your familiar can flank with you and your allies until the end of your next turn.

Shielding the Bound Spirit.name: Shielding the Bound Spirit
Shielding the Bound Spirit.flavor: Sometimes your familiar enters combat, and you have to make sure that you protect it.
Shielding the Bound Spirit.effect: Your familiar gains a power bonus to all defenses equal to your Charisma modifier and resist 10 to all damage until the end of the encounter.

Chaos Poison Blast.name: Chaos Poison Blast
Chaos Poison Blast.flavor: You crack planar boundaries, seeping extraplanar poison into your enemy’s body.
Chaos Poison Blast.activeFamiliar: If you rolled an even number on the attack roll, the target cannot take opportunity actions until the end of your next turn. If you rolled an odd number on the attack roll, the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
Chaos Poison Blast.onHit: 2d10 + Charisma modifier poison damage. If the attack roll was a natural 20, the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.

Opportunistic Familiar.name: Opportunistic Familiar
Opportunistic Familiar.flavor: Your familiar moves about the field of battle, seeking to take advantage of cracks in your opponent’s defenses.
Opportunistic Familiar.effect: Until the end of the encounter, your familiar gains hit points equal to your bloodied value, and you can give your familiar the following special commands.
Opportunistic Familiar.standardAction: Melee 1; targets one creature; Charisma vs. AC; 2d10 + Charisma modifier damage.
Opportunistic Familiar.opportunityAttack: Melee 1; targets one creature; Charisma vs. AC; 1d10 + Charisma modifier damage, and the target takes 5 ongoing damage (save ends).
Opportunistic Familiar.minorAction: Your familiar moves up to its speed +2.

Rise, My Pet.name: Rise, My Pet
Rise, My Pet.flavor: Your familiar rises from the dead on the battlefield and is ready to act again.
Rise, My Pet.effect: Your familiar appears in passive mode in your space or in active mode adjacent to you, even if it is destroyed.

Rolls of Thunder.name: Rolls of Thunder
Rolls of Thunder.flavor: Spheres of thunder manifest and roll through the air to bowl over your enemies.
Rolls of Thunder.onHit: 3d10 + Charisma modifier damage, and the target falls prone.
Rolls of Thunder.activeFamiliar: You can also push the target 3 squares.

Spiritual Venom.name: Spiritual Venom
Spiritual Venom.flavor: Your familiar manifests a stinger and injects your foe.
Spiritual Venom.requirement: Your familiar must be in its active mode.
Spiritual Venom.target: One creature adjacent to your familiar
Spiritual Venom.onHit: 3d10 + Charisma modifier poison damage, and the target takes ongoing 10 poison damage (save ends).
Spiritual Venom.onMiss: Half damage, and the target takes ongoing 5 poison damage (save ends).

Savior Spirit.name: Savior Spirit
Savior Spirit.flavor: Your familiar latches onto an ally, then both teleport away.
Savior Spirit.requirement: Your familiar must be in its active mode.
Savior Spirit.target: One ally adjacent to your familiar
Savior Spirit.effect: Teleport your familiar and the target 10 squares to squares adjacent to one another. Then, you can teleport your familiar 10 squares.

Inferno Ring.name: Inferno Ring
Inferno Ring.flavor: A ring of fire settles down around your enemy, charring it and its allies.
Inferno Ring.onHit: 2d10 + Charisma modifier fire damage, and each enemy adjacent to the target takes 1d10 + Charisma modifier fire damage.
Inferno Ring.activeFamiliar: Each enemy adjacent to your familiar takes 1d10 + Charisma modifier fire damage.

Chaotic Spray.name: Chaotic Spray
Chaotic Spray.flavor: Arcs of raw primordial energy lash out from your body, becoming deadlier to those near your familiar.
Chaotic Spray.onHit: 2d10 + Charisma modifier acid and lightning damage, and ongoing 10 acid and lightning damage (save ends).
Chaotic Spray.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 5 acid and lightning damage (save ends).
Chaotic Spray.activeFamiliar: If the target is adjacent to your familiar, it gains vulnerable 5 acid until it saves against the ongoing damage from this power.

Lightning Backlash.name: Lightning Backlash
Lightning Backlash.flavor: Lightning rips from your fingertips, jumping from creature to creature.
Lightning Backlash.onHit: 4d10 + Charisma modifier lightning damage, and make a secondary attack if your familiar is in active mode.
Lightning Backlash.secondaryTarget: Each creature adjacent to your familiar

Necrotic Storm.name: Necrotic Storm
Necrotic Storm.flavor: Black tendrils attack your enemy seemingly out of nowhere, pulling your enemy apart.
Necrotic Storm.onHit: 6d10 + Charisma modifier necrotic damage, and the target is stunned (save ends).
Necrotic Storm.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).
Necrotic Storm.activeFamiliar: When the target saves against this power, you can destroy your familiar as a free action to make the target reroll the saving throw and take the lower result.

Ensorcelled Blade.name: Ensorcelled Blade
Ensorcelled Blade.flavor: Your blade flashes into action in a painful riposte as your innate magical power flows into it.
Ensorcelled Blade.requirement: You must be wielding a dagger.
Ensorcelled Blade.onHit:
1[W] + Charisma modifier damage. If the target hits or misses you with a melee attack before the start of your next turn, it takes damage equal to the extra damage from your Spell Source class feature. This damage is of a single type to which you have resistance arising from your Spell Source class feature.
Increase damage to 2[W] + Charisma modifier at 21st level.
Ensorcelled Blade.special: You can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Teleporting Strike.name: Teleporting Strike
Teleporting Strike.flavor: You stab your enemy, then teleport around it and stab it again to hamper its actions.
Teleporting Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a dagger.
Teleporting Strike.effect: You teleport to a square adjacent to the target and make a secondary attack.
Teleporting Strike.secondaryAttack: Charisma vs. AC. If you hit with the primary attack, you have combat advantage for this attack.
Teleporting Strike.secondaryOnHit: The target is slowed and weakened until the end of your next turn.

Lightning Cuts.name: Lightning Cuts
Lightning Cuts.flavor: Your dagger is enveloped by electricity and you move with blinding speed, delivering a dozen shallow cuts to your opponent before it can even blink.
Lightning Cuts.requirement: You must be wielding a dagger.

Blinding Blade.name: Blinding Blade
Blinding Blade.flavor: Light flashes brightly from your blade, burning your opponent’s eyes even as you lunge into another attack.
Blinding Blade.requirement: You must be wielding a dagger.
Blinding Blade.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target is blinded (save ends).
Blinding Blade.onMiss: Half damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Dweomer Dagger.name: Dweomer Dagger
Dweomer Dagger.flavor: Your dagger pierces more than the target’s flesh, opening its aura to your magic.
Dweomer Dagger.requirement: You must be wielding a dagger.
Dweomer Dagger.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

Force Daggers.name: Force Daggers
Force Daggers.flavor: You sheathe your dagger in a field of force, which then shatters into a dozen floating replicas all over the battlefield, mimicking your moves.
Force Daggers.requirement: You must be wielding a dagger.
Force Daggers.target: Each enemy you can see in the blast
Force Daggers.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier force damage. If only one target was in the blast, you deal 3[W] extra force damage.

Everywhere and Nowhere.name: Everywhere and Nowhere
Everywhere and Nowhere.flavor: You burn your presence from the enemy’s mind so that when it tries to find you, you are gone, always one step out of reach.
Everywhere and Nowhere.onHit: 2d12 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target treats you as invisible (save ends).
Everywhere and Nowhere.onMiss: Half damage, and you are invisible to the target until the end of your next turn.
Everywhere and Nowhere.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever the target makes an attack while you are invisible to it, it takes 5 psychic damage and you may teleport 5 squares as a free action.

Elemental Bolt.name: Elemental Bolt
Elemental Bolt.flavor: You hurl a spear of elemental energy at your foe.
Elemental Bolt.onHit:
1d12 + Charisma modifier damage.
    Level 21: 2d12 + Charisma modifier damage.
Elemental Bolt.special: This power can be used as a ranged basic attack.

Elemental Escalation (Air).name: Elemental Escalation (Air)
Elemental Escalation (Air).flavor: The tempest’s power surges through you, wrathfully striking your enemies and lifting you aloft.
Elemental Escalation (Air).trigger: You use a sorcerer at-will attack power.
Elemental Escalation (Air).effect:
You can make one additional creature a target of the triggering attack. If the attack’s range is melee or ranged, the additional target must be within 5 squares of you. If the attack’s range is area or close, the additional target must be adjacent to the burst or blast.
    Each target hit by the attack takes 1d10 extra damage of the type dealt by the triggering attack In addition, you fly up to half your speed as a free action.
    Level 17: 2d10 extra damage, and you also slide the target up to 2 squares.
    Level 27: 3d10 extra damage, and the target is also blinded until the end of your next turn.
Elemental Escalation (Air).special: You can use this power only once per round.

Elemental Escalation (Earth).name: Elemental Escalation (Earth)
Elemental Escalation (Earth).flavor: Earth energy infuses you with resilience. It allows you to deliver mighty blows and great hindrances to your foes.
Elemental Escalation (Earth).trigger: You use a sorcerer at-will attack power.
Elemental Escalation (Earth).effect:
You can make one additional creature a target of the triggering attack. If the attack’s range is melee or ranged, the additional target must be within 5 squares of you. If the attack’s range is area or close, the additional target must be adjacent to the burst or blast.
    Each target hit by the attack takes 1d10 extra damage of the type dealt by the triggering attack. In addition, you gain temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.
    Level 17: 2d10 extra damage, and the target is also immobilized until the end of your next turn.
    Level 27: 3d10 extra damage, and you also gain resistance to all damage equal to one-half your level until the end of your next turn.
Elemental Escalation (Earth).special: You can use this power only once per round.

Elemental Escalation (Fire).name: Elemental Escalation (Fire)
Elemental Escalation (Fire).flavor: As elemental energy flows through you, the rage of your internal inferno infuses it, and you move like a wildfire.
Elemental Escalation (Fire).trigger: You use a sorcerer at-will attack power.
Elemental Escalation (Fire).effect:
You can make one additional creature a target of the triggering attack. If the attack’s range is melee or ranged, the additional target must be within 5 squares of you. If the attack’s range is area or close, the additional target must be adjacent to the burst or blast.
    Each target hit by the attack takes 1d10 extra damage of the type dealt by the triggering attack. In addition, you shift up to half your speed as a free action.
    Level 17: 2d10 extra damage, and ongoing 10 fire damage (save ends).
    Level 27: 3d10 extra damage, and the attack also deals half damage on a miss.
Elemental Escalation (Fire).special: You can use this power only once per round.

Elemental Escalation (Water).name: Elemental Escalation (Water)
Elemental Escalation (Water).flavor: A whirlpool wells up within, deflecting harm from you and  overwhelming your enemies.
Elemental Escalation (Water).trigger: You use a sorcerer at-will attack power.
Elemental Escalation (Water).effect:
You can make one additional creature a target of the triggering attack. If the attack’s range is melee or ranged, the additional target must be within 5 squares of you. If the attack’s range is area or close, the additional target must be adjacent to the burst or blast.
    Each target hit by the attack takes 1d10 extra damage of the type dealt by the triggering attack. In addition, you gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.
    Level 17: 2d10 extra damage, and the target is also dazed until the end of your next turn.
    Level 27: 3d10 extra damage, and the target also falls prone.
Elemental Escalation (Water).special: You can use this power only once per round.

Blazing Cloud.name: Blazing Cloud
Blazing Cloud.flavor: You surround yourself in a nimbus of roaring flames.
Blazing Cloud.onHit:
1d8 + Charisma modifier fire damage.
    Level 21: 2d8 + Charisma modifier fire damage.
Blazing Cloud.effect: You gain a +2 power bonus to AC and Reflex until the start of your next turn.

Deluge.name: Deluge
Deluge.flavor: You pull a mass of water from the elemental plane, hammering your enemies and sweeping them off their feet.
Deluge.onHit:
1d8 + Charisma modifier damage, and you push the target 1 square.
    Level 21: 2d8 + Charisma modifier damage.

Erupting Earth.name: Erupting Earth
Erupting Earth.flavor: You bring forth a mass of earth and rock from the elemental plane, battering your enemies and pinning them in place.
Erupting Earth.onHit:
1d6 + Charisma modifier damage.
    Level 21: 2d6 + Charisma modifier damage.
Erupting Earth.effect: The area becomes difficult terrain until the end of your next turn.

Howling Zephyr.name: Howling Zephyr
Howling Zephyr.flavor: You command the air to swirl violently, creating a short-lived zephyr of thunderous wind that sweeps away your enemy.
Howling Zephyr.onHit:
1d8 + Charisma modifier thunder damage, and you can slide the target 1 square.
    Level 21: 2d8 + Charisma modifier thunder damage.

Ice Prison.name: Ice Prison
Ice Prison.flavor: You create a cloud of intense cold and swift-growing icicles that chills your foes for a time.
Ice Prison.onHit:
1d8 + Charisma modifier cold damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
    Level 21: 2d8 + Charisma modifier cold damage.

Ignition.name: Ignition
Ignition.flavor: You hurl a concussive blast, causing everything in the area to smoke, smolder, and then burst into flame.
Ignition.onHit:
1d10 + Charisma modifier damage.
    Level 21: 2d10 + Charisma modifier damage.
Ignition.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the start of your next turn. Any creature that enters the zone or ends its turn there takes fire damage equal to your Constitution modifier. A creature can take this damage only once per turn.

Seismic Shock.name: Seismic Shock
Seismic Shock.flavor: You strike the ground, creating an abrupt tremor of seismic activity. Enemies in the area are disoriented.
Seismic Shock.onHit:
1d8 + Charisma modifier thunder damage, and the target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.
    Level 21: 2d8 + Charisma modifier thunder damage.

Static Charge.name: Static Charge
Static Charge.flavor: You create a shaped pulse of lightning that shocks foes standing near you, arcing to additional enemies near them.
Static Charge.onHit:
1d8 lightning damage, and one enemy adjacent to the target takes lightning damage equal to your Charisma modifier.
    Level 21: 2d8 lightning damage.

Rock Armor.name: Rock Armor
Rock Armor.flavor: You shield yourself with armor shaped from the rock, pebbles, and earth around you.
Rock Armor.effect: You assume the rock armor stance. Until the stance ends, you are slowed and gain resistance to all damage equal to your Charisma modifier.

Shield of Flames.name: Shield of Flames
Shield of Flames.flavor: You conjure a sphere of blazing hot flames, obscuring your form and damaging enemies who tarry too close.
Shield of Flames.effect: You activate an aura 1 that lasts until the end of your next turn. You have partial concealment against enemies in the aura, and any creature that makes a melee attack against you or ends its turn in the aura takes fire damage equal to your Charisma modifier. A creature can take this damage only once per turn.

Wall of Water.name: Wall of Water
Wall of Water.flavor: You shape water into a foot-thick vertical wall that interferes with attacks and movement for a short time.
Wall of Water.effect: You create a wall of water that lasts until the end of your next turn. The wall provides superior cover against attacks made through it. A creature must swim to move through the wall (Athletics DC 10). In addition, a creature passing through the wall gains vulnerable 5 cold until the end of its next turn.
Wall of Water.sustainMinor: The wall persists until the end of your next turn.
Wall of Water.special: If any part of the wall meets an area of liquid water at least 5 squares in size, you can increase the area to a wall 10.

Whirling Wind.name: Whirling Wind
Whirling Wind.flavor: Whirling air surrounds you, protecting you and obscuring your position.
Whirling Wind.effect: The burst creates a zone of lightly obscured squares that lasts until the end of your next turn. Creatures in the zone must spend 1 extra square for each square of movement toward you.

Raise Stone.name: Raise Stone
Raise Stone.flavor: You raise or lower a column of rock from the ground.
Raise Stone.target: One square of stone, mud, or dirt
Raise Stone.effect: You cause the target square to rise up to 20 feet or sink up to 10 feet. If you raise the square, the area below it is filled with solid rock and becomes blocking terrain. Creatures in the target square can shift 1 square as a free action to avoid being raised or lowered. This power cannot be used to harm a creature, and any such use causes the power to fail. The target square remains at its new elevation until the end of the encounter.

Fire Stride.name: Fire Stride
Fire Stride.flavor: You step into a blazing fire and instantly teleport to another nearby fire without harm.
Fire Stride.requirement: You must be adjacent to a fire of campfire size or larger.
Fire Stride.effect: You teleport up to 10 squares to a square adjacent to a fire of campfire size or larger.

Water to Ice.name: Water to Ice
Water to Ice.flavor: Using cold to directly harm your enemies is one thing. You can also turn it to your advantage by using cold against water, freezing the area around you.
Water to Ice.effect: You cause nonliving water in the burst to freeze to a depth of 6 inches. Mud or swamp freezes, becoming normal terrain. Wet floors change to slick ice, becoming difficult terrain. Ice covers bodies of water in the area, which can now be walked on (although the ice is difficult terrain). A creature that enters a square of this ice or starts its turn there must make a DC 11 Acrobatics check or fall prone. The transformed ice remains frozen until it melts naturally.

Wind Rider.name: Wind Rider
Wind Rider.flavor: Powerful winds bear you aloft by pushing against the ground beneath you.
Wind Rider.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you can fly up to your speed as a move action (altitude limit 4). You grant combat advantage while aloft.
Wind Rider.sustainStandard: The effect persists until the end of your next turn.

Control Flame.name: Control Flame
Control Flame.flavor: You command a fire to burn more fiercely, or move it to a new location.
Control Flame.effect:
You take control of each nonliving fire in the burst that is not controlled by a creature. Choose one of the following options for each fire.
    Expand: The fire expands to a square adjacent to it.
    Extinguish: The fire is extinguished.
    Relocate: You move the fire up to 2 squares.
Expanded or relocated flames return to their normal size and location at the end of your next turn.
Control Flame.sustainMinor: The effect persists until the end of your next turn, and you can expand, extinguish, or relocate the controlled flames again.

Earth Passage.name: Earth Passage
Earth Passage.flavor: You stride through earth or stone as if it isn’t there.
Earth Passage.effect: You move up to your speed. During this movement, you can pass through stone, rock, sand, or earth, and you have tremorsense 1. If you end this movement inside solid earth, you immediately move to an unoccupied square nearest your entry point.

Elemental Shield.name: Elemental Shield
Elemental Shield.flavor: You block a dangerous manifestation of the elements with an immediate counterspell, protecting yourself and your allies.
Elemental Shield.trigger: You or an ally within 2 squares of you takes acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage.
Elemental Shield.target: You and each ally in the burst
Elemental Shield.effect: Until the end of your next turn, each target gains resist 10 to the triggering damage type.

Elemental Warding.name: Elemental Warding
Elemental Warding.flavor: You ward an area with seething elemental power.
Elemental Warding.target: One, two, or three squares in the burst
Elemental Warding.effect: Choose acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder. Each target square becomes a zone that lasts until the end of the encounter. You or an ally gains resist 10 to damage of the chosen type while in the zone.

Elemental Translation.name: Elemental Translation
Elemental Translation.flavor: You create a large volume of elemental material.
Elemental Translation.effect:
You push each target to a square adjacent to the blast. If a target can’t be pushed, its space is excluded from the blast. Choose air, earth, fire, or water to determine the blast’s effect.
    Air: Normal fires in the blast are extinguished, and gases or vapors are dispersed.
    Earth: The blast is filled with firmly packed dirt and is blocking terrain.
    Fire (Zone): Burning embers and flames create a zone that lasts until the end of the encounter. Any creature in the zone has vulnerable 10 fire.
    Water: A mass of water appears in the blast and collapses into a pool 2 feet deep and a 10 squares in diameter centered on the blast, becoming difficult terrain until the end of your next turn. It then becomes 6 inches deep and 20 squares in diameter, and has no effect on movement.

Icy Integument.name: Icy Integument
Icy Integument.flavor: You armor yourself with ice covered in sharp icicles. You radiate bitter cold, slowing your attackers.
Icy Integument.effect: You activate an aura 1 that lasts until the end of your next turn. Any creature in the aura that makes a melee attack against you takes cold damage equal to 10 + your Charisma modifier, and it is slowed until the end of its next turn. While the aura is active, you have partial cover.

Tornado Leap.name: Tornado Leap
Tornado Leap.flavor: You leap into the air in a violent cyclone.
Tornado Leap.effect: You fly up to your speed + 2. You also gain a fly speed equal to your speed and can hover until the end of your next turn.

Elemental Rift.name: Elemental Rift
Elemental Rift.flavor: You open a vortex leading to the elemental planes. Any creature that ventures too close is sucked inside it.
Elemental Rift.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. When an enemy enters the zone or starts its turn there, it is slowed until the end of its next turn and pulled 1 square toward the center of the zone. If a creature ends its turn in the zone, it is removed from play (save ends).
Elemental Rift.sustainMinor: The zone persists until the end of your next turn.

Suppress Element.name: Suppress Element
Suppress Element.flavor: You weaken the strength of effects and creatures affiliated with one of the elements.
Suppress Element.effect:
You activate an aura 3 that lasts until the end of the encounter. Choose air, earth, fire, or water to determine the aura’s effect.
    Air: Lightning damage is halved against you and your allies in the aura. If an enemy that has the air subtype ends its turn in the aura, that enemy is dazed until the end of its next turn.
    Earth: Thunder damage is halved against you and your allies in the aura. If an enemy that has the earth subtype ends its turn in the aura, that enemy is dazed until the end of its next turn.
    Fire: Fire damage is halved against you and your allies in the aura. If an enemy that has the fire subtype ends its turn in the aura, that enemy is dazed until the end of its next turn.
    Water: Cold damage is halved against you and your allies in the aura. If an enemy that has the water subtype ends its turn in the aura, that enemy is dazed until the end of its next turn.

Stormy Emotions.name: Stormy Emotions
Stormy Emotions.sourceRef: Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook
Stormy Emotions.flavor: Weaving raw emotion into your spell, you unleash a brutal attack against those around you.
Stormy Emotions.onHit: 2d10 cold and lightning damage, and you can push the target 1 square and knock it prone.
